website_summaries.verdict: Good key finder if you have multiple items you want to track.
pros: 6 fobs for keys, remotes, and even pets
Bright colors help find lost items
cons: Fobs are on the big side, and they aren't waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These key finder are OK but they don't live up to the hype in the ads. We tried out the "up to" 80 ft. range. With us in the living room and the key receiver in our sun room (App.35 ft.) we were able to connect with the transmitter but could barely hear the "up to" 90dB chime, as we moved farther away, app .45 ft. the transmitter was unable to connect with the receiver. These are ok for the use of finding items in the house as you move around and that's probably what they are made for. So its not a bad purchase as long as you don't expect to achieve the ad claims
customer_reviews.author: AFR

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying them - what does that say?
customer_reviews.text: I have used these devices for several years now. They are simple, low tech and easy to use. They have quality issues with the battery installation and battery retention. The design does not seem robust to me, but for some reason, they take quite a beating. Being on my keys and in my wallet is not an easy life for any piece of technology. The most impressive feature is the Click'N'Go customer service. I had issues early on several years ago, and they just kept replacing no questions asked. I prefer a supplier that stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Alleman

customer_reviews.title: Work but not for long
customer_reviews.text: I have used these key finders for a while to find my keys. They work great initially but there is an issue after a while. My key ring receivers (bell) are all useless now. Their battery covers are lost because they don’t have any screw to secure the covers. The other receivers don‘t have rings For keys so I can’t use them. To share my lesson learned, if you plan to use or are using these key ring receivers for your keys, I would recommend taping the battery covers before you lose them like me. Too bad that mine is out of warranty. I will have to find a different band for my keys.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: They will find your keys
customer_reviews.text: The ones that have a hole are great - you can put them on your key ring. The three that are supposed to be attached with double sided tape are useless. If you tape them to your car remote - it covers the battery. If you throw them in your purse you can use them that way. Really they should have made six with holes in them to attach to your key ring. Half of these are useless. I haven't had them long enough to speak to battery life or durability or versatility - ergo the 3 star.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Two of the beepers we're broken right out of the box. Couldn't get them to beep. Often times the rest of them won't beep unless I'm within 2 or 3 feet away and I had to point the remote directly at the beaper. I purchased three different models of these RF key finders and this one was the worst. The Mitcien Key finder was the best of the three models I tested
customer_reviews.author: Army MP

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent service!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I have one on my key ring, one attached to my ebook, and another in an inside pocket of my cell phone case. They have saved me several times. As for their customer service....it's fabulous! I lost the lid to the battery compartment. The Key Finder still worked, but the battery was exposed. I sent an email asking if I could purchase just the lid to the battery compartment. I received a friendly email asking for my address and indicating they would put one in the mail the next day. I got it in two days at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: DorisM

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We attached to our car keys and TV remotes and have had the "opportunity" to use several times already as we tend to misplace these items or the remotes fall between the couch cushions. Only issue is they are a bit large and add bulk to the car keyrings, and also are too big to adhere properly to the remotes so we had to add tape to keep them on. They still work. We do recommend. Good price. Have had for 2 months and batteries still work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who are prone to loosing things. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This key finder has been a lifesaver - without it I would have had to reschedule several appointments and would have been late to work on a number of occasions. Also perfect for teenagers who constantly loose their phone, keys, wallet, etc. Use it for any item you regularly loose. It works as described, easy to use, durable, and good price for the quality. I hope this review was helpful in answering some of your questions. Happy shopping! ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Red, RN

customer_reviews.title: Misplaced your keys?  Find them in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: I just love being able to find my misplaced keys, remote, etc with these. It is a great product. There were two reasons I did not give them five stars - the receivers are quite bulky and the backs have fallen off the receivers on the keychains so the battery is exposed and could easily fall out. If I had know it would fall off, I would have at least taped it on so I wouldn't lose it. Overall, these have rescued me several times when I couldn't find my keys and were well worth buying just to prevent the frustration that misplaced items can cause.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, bad stickers.
customer_reviews.text: The remote is kind of hiccupy, it works 2 out of 3 times, but it does work. It has an amazing range as well, and the sound is very sharp and distinct. I did receive replacement batteries as well, so that was wonderful. My only issue would be what some other people said, The stickers are very weak, and don't really adhere to anything other than other plastic very well. So if you are going to buy these, I would suggest buying some stronger adhesive tape as well. Other than that, I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R.

customer_reviews.title: One design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to track the remotes that our children would lose (often deep into furniture). They worked great until the batteries died (the battery life did leave something to be desired). Some of the trackers came with a foam adhesive pad to stick them to things. While they were thoroughly stuck and in no danger of coming off, they covered the battery access. There was no way to unscrew the backing without unsticking the tracker, which rips the foam, meaning new adhesive foam is required. That seems like poor planning. Still, they do work, and they are loud enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I have bought this. We loved the previous set to death, breaking and losing the fobs. How do you lose the fobs? You neglect to replace the batteries, then lose your keys. The last set we got saved the day on many occasions: My husband has a bad habit of mislaying his keys and his wallet. The range is very long and the sound is quite loud. Been waiting till Christmas to get it again. If you have trouble keeping track of things, this is a great solution.
customer_reviews.author: LUCIA J FIERO

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Good little gismo? 1st not all that small. About size of silver dollar. Would be nice if they all had way to put on key ring. Not as loud as avertised, but load enough to hear, even in next room. Need to label all 6 remote buttons, I used a permanent marker. To soon to tell how long the batteries work and the remote & units hold up.
customer_reviews.author: White-Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer, Save Hours Looking For Keys and Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, has saved us hours and hours of searching for our cell phones and keys. My wife and I both have these on our keys and she also mounted one to her cell phone. The design is slim enough that it will work on virtually any product. The battery life is also very good, I just replaced one (extras provided) after about 1.5 years. Just press the button and your item will beep. It is that easy. The range is great in my house, even beeps if left in my garage. If you are looking for a key/phone finder, stop and purchase this item. It has been a life changer for us.
customer_reviews.author: HWT

customer_reviews.title: Click and Dig, Bails and Fails.  Don't buy. Eats batteries. Failed first time we needed it.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months into having these, first time we needed to use it failed. These things eat batteries and do not have the boasted range. If you for some reason love changing small batteries in small devices monthly then you will enjoy the click n dig. I found these a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Booked

customer_reviews.title: Time saver for those who misplace things!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things!!! I'm always misplacing my keys and now I simply find them by using the remote an listening for the beep. I put one on my wife's key ring also on my dogs collar. He's a beagle and wanders and he knows the beep gets him a treat when we want him to come in, especially at night.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, small price for something helpful
customer_reviews.text: Had the four unit set before, replaced it with the six unit this time. Volumes vary a little, but I generally get a years worth out of these little doodads... I don't bother messing w new batteries as the supplied replacements are cheapies. Just buy a new set of finders once a year, small investment for something this helpful. Have the remote on my satchel, and just go through the buttons to make sure I have my keys, wallet, tablet and phone (see video)... The one finder balked a little at the end, but checked in find after another push. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Drewski

customer_reviews.title: Greatest frustration preventer!
customer_reviews.text: Always losing my car key fob after the key holder broke off. This is great! Have locator for house keys, car key and robot vac. The only thing I don't like is when it sticks to the back of the remote it will have to be unstuck to change batteries. They should have thought that one through a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Joy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for finding misplaced remotes or keys
customer_reviews.text: Will be nice for finding misplace remotes or keys. One of them beeps occasionally when just jiggled a bit. Overall pretty good for the price paid. I should make a list of which color goes with which remote/keychain. Seems to work throughout my medium size condo, so a fairly decent range. I found some extra CR2025 batteries for a fairly cheap price online so I have some on hand since I don't know how long the batteries will last. So far they seem fine though, and it's been a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Find my phone
customer_reviews.text: In a forgetful guy and i am always forgetting where i put my phone my Bluetooth speaker. Luckily though i usually keep my keys in my pocket. This product makes a fairly loud audible beep with a 10-20 foot range(unless you have the speaker on the front blocked then half it) making finding the spot that i left it last easy. The only bad thing is i push the buttons on the remote in my pocket and the remote dies pretty quick comes with extra batteries so wasn't the worst thing ever. The double stick tape on the back is strong have never had one just fall off.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainEo

customer_reviews.title: eh...
customer_reviews.text: These were helpful while the batteries lasted. Not sure if they have batteries that can be purchased for replacement, but it doesn't matter since I can't find most of the devices any. Almost comedic...I know they'll show up eventually but in the meantime I'm short a remote, a phone, and a set of keys. It would've been nice if they had a low battery warning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: this key finder has saved my life many times. I have one on my purse, keys and wallet, The ones that stick on I have them on the remote control for the tv and cable box, and my cell phone cover, I have the transponder on a silver chaIn so when I go out ( and I cant find keys, etc I press the corresponding color and I am able to track the missing item quickly fact I friend of my liked this idea so much, I got her a set..
customer_reviews.author: janetb

customer_reviews.title: But I would still recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without these before. I lose my keys, wallet, and remote control constantly. It helps me find my stuff instantly. Only negatives are - not being able to label the colors so I know what color is attched to what item, and the sticker doesn't work well. One fell off already so I need to restick it with something else. But I would still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars updated to five
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for awhile and then just quit working. Good while it lasted. I'm updating my initial report on this key finder because of the superior warranty that the supplier offers on their equipment. Any device can sometimes become problematic. What really matters when this happens is that the seller offers to replace the device without giving you the run around. For this reason I verify my address you have on record and thank you for the replacement offer.
customer_reviews.author: Emil H Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The remote works great to locate the items and the beep is nice ...
customer_reviews.text: It is rare for products to include batteries. This product goes above and beyond, including not only batteries, but also REPLACEMENT batteries. The remote works great to locate the items and the beep is nice and loud. If you are having any trouble getting it to work, make sure that you are holding that button on the remote down for three seconds or so. Has worked for us every time- the kids had great fun testing it out! My only little snag was that the sticky tabs did not stay stuck. The keychain devices are perfect, but if I had it to do over, I would make sure to really clean the device before sticking the tabs.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the Tile a few years ago and found it was a pain to use and did not work. We have multiple homes and vehicles and finding our keys had always been a hassle. I found Click 'n Dig several years ago and it has saved me hours of searching. I also put one of the receivers onto my Kindle because I am always leaving it tossed around somewhere. Love this key finder.
customer_reviews.author: M. SCHEBECK

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! The set comes with 2 sets of batteries. One set of batteries is already installed into the remote and the 6 receivers. The remote's battery should last about a year; the receiver batteries should last about 6 months. There are small plastic tabs inserted into the receivers that you have to pull out to be able to activate each receiver. Very easy to remove just tug gently and wiggle the tab to remove it. You might have to press the button on the remote for a couple of seconds before you hear the corresponding beep from the receiver. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tracker!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the range of the remote to find the missing item. We live in a large, spread out home and the beeps are audible from several rooms away. So far the only downside in the size of the attachments. They are large for many of the modern, sleek remote controls so kind hang over the edges. The attachments for keys or attachments on phones and tablets are great. We have been able to find every missing item and with several small children in the house, that is a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: lyriccat

customer_reviews.title: too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I returned it after I received the item. It was so bulky, it was not going to really fit on anything else other than keys. I would not put this on my phone, remote control, or in my wallet. Too bad, I really wanted an item that would help me find my keys/ wallet/ phone quickly. And I did not want to spend the money on the Cube, but maybe I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the concept the beepers r not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the concept the beepers r not loud enough. Placed inside your purse the beep is even lower. Most importantly u have to have the receiver with u, if u loose/ misplace things WHAT's the point. One more cheaply made thing to misplace. There is ONE receiver, if lost the game is over. No U will not recommend this item. All I did was waste money.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my mother-in-law as a gift. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother-in-law as a gift. She is ALWAYS losing her car key, house key, cell phones ( she has 2 because she always loses one! ). Wasn't sure if she would use it or it would be too complicated. She not only uses it but loves it! And no more late night or early morning phone calls for spare keys! Totallt
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it will
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with this. I don't lost so many things but across the family we have remote controls, keys and a few other things that decide to make a run for it once in a while and magically end up in a place that nobody, of course, put them. So far, we have had good luck with this and it has helped us find many items around the house. The beep is loud enough to hear without too much wandering in the house. What keeps it from five stars is more a wish list item than any reflection on performance. I wish the remote sensors were a bit smaller. Overall I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dbldutch

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I am always misplacing things! LOL PROBLEM SOLVED! I put one on my keys, one on my tv remote, one on my cellphone case and have 2 left! Have already used it many times! Helps me not get so frustrated in the morning when I can't find my keys, just press the button for 'keys' and find them right away! I used a fine tip marker to write on each color what it's for, and this makes THIS 'biggest loser' very happy!! My husband laughs at me, but hey....it works!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: then this is a very good product. Works effectively
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a simple but effective way to locate small items (i.e. keys, wallet, etc.), then this is a very good product. Works effectively. The only down-side is if you have a small item, like keys, attached to the finder and it happens to be buried under a small pile of clothes, the alert sound may be muffled so that you can't hear it loudly unless you happen to be very near. But apart from this, its a great help to locate those items that you often misplace around the house or elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lord of Sipon

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Reliable Key Finder
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine a few weeks ago and it's already come in handy a few times. Aside from using them to find our house and car keys, we've attached them to valuables (cameras, purses, phones) for my elderly in-laws who's starting to have memory issues. It always works when we try to use it and battery life has been great. I definitely recommend it especially for people who are constantly losing and trying to find stuff. I would like the finders to be a little smaller (the size they are not makes it impracticable to use on phones or remote controls) but, for the price and the reliability of the product, I really can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it actually worked
customer_reviews.text: I was convinced by positive reviews that this thing worked and the negative reviewers were just not using it well. I got this as a gift for my parents, they loved the idea! We did some experiments with it however and it didn't work, the beep wasn't loud enough and the remote rarely "connected" with the key chain. SO if you know what room your keys are in and vaguely what part of the room they are in this will work about 40% of the time..........not exactly very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: lysa

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for something like this for years. The beeping sound could be louder, though. You need to be within one or two feet from it to hear it but I just love having this. The first day I received it I had lost my tv remote but I was able to locate it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Mincoak

customer_reviews.title: I already used this one time to find my keys!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I regularly "misplace" my keys. So frustrating! I attached the key ring pieces to my keys, then stuck the 3 "stick-ons" to my smart phone, large notebook (my brain), and one other think I can't remember. (No wonder I lose my keys.) I have used the key finder once since I got it and it lead me straight to my "lost" key. Of course, this only works if you are in proximity to your keys, not if you dropped them at the park, but I typically set my keys somewhere in the house -- a coat pocket, another purse, under some papers, etc. This works great to find them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Childs

customer_reviews.title: Recommend with a few notes.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with extra sticky pads and a small screwdriver. (Eyeglass size I believe) within a month we had to replace 2 batteries. The warning they are low is ridiculous. They just go off and off until you take it apart. So if you don't have that screwdriver- be prepared to look like Pheobe on Friends as she searches the whole house for a hiding place. and if you need to replace the battery the sticky pad gets destroyed. Other than that it's saved my sanity. My toddlers walk off with my stuff ALL day long and now I'm not stressed wondering where my keys, phone, tv remotes etc are hiding.
customer_reviews.author: queenpineberryTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT, SAVES TIME & FRUSTRATION! 😀
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PRODUCT! If you are anything like me stuff gets "misplaced" a lot, these make life SOOO much easier. I just hung the locator device on a hook in a central place in my house & now I don't have to worry about losing keys, my phone or remotes anymore. The locators that are not keyrings I used some velcro to attach to my phone & TV remotes & that is working beautifully. I really love & am grateful for the opportunity to test this product, especially since I sent a bunch of them for Christmas presents. These are great & definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: AmK

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life better, no more frustration as I'm getting ready to ...
customer_reviews.text: I loose everything, all the time! Makes my life better, no more frustration as I'm getting ready to leave only to spend 30 minutes looking for my keys/phone/wallet! Good product. Loud beeps are easily heard if item is not stuffed deep under blankets or pillows, you can still hear it even if it's in another room, albeit faintly, but it's loud enough for a 30-something with perfect hearing. Thanks developers for decreasing tension in my relationship, 'cause I misplace things so often. Stopped working after just 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Caro

customer_reviews.title: I press the purple button until I hear the "beep beep" and we are good to go
customer_reviews.text: Click n' Dig has been a true life saver! No longer are we frantically running around before work and school shouting "where are my keys?" "where is my phone?" We have attached these gadgets to the keys, the phones, remote control and even put one inside my son's wallet. We keep a little chart that shows which color has been affixed to which item. So if I'm missing my car keys for example, I press the purple button until I hear the "beep beep" and we are good to go! I have the adhesive finders stuck to the back of our phone cases. It's a little unwieldy but worth the trade off of trying to find lost phones. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kiesel

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the click 'n dig
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the click 'n dig. My 10 year old keeps losing our remotes so this product has come in very handy. It works through walls which makes it amazing. We tested it from the living room to my daughters bedroom (about 9 feet) because she tends to move the remotes around and to her room. I had to attach heavy duty Velcro to the bigger pieces and to the bigger remotes so it's easier to change the batteries when needed. I absolutely love this product and give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent locator but wish it was smaller
customer_reviews.text: These locators are loud enough to locate from a floor away, which is great! But I wish they were smaller/thinner. The hanging ones are about 2" x 1.5". I've put one on my dog's collar and my keys. The ones you stick on are about 3" x 2" and over 1/4" thick with the tape, so it's a little bulky when you stick it on a remote. I think it's out of the question to stick on your phone or put in a wallet (but that's just me!). I do like that it comes with extra batteries though.
customer_reviews.author: Jen P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Attach the finder to something so you don't lose it too!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike my phone, my car keys don't come with a way to call them. This has cased many frantic high-stress mornings. I got this set over a year ago, and it is still working great. I keep one receiver in a pocket in my purse, and another on my car keys. Haven't had to use the others. As a tip - keep the finder in one place. I actually attached mine to the inside door of one of my kitchen cabinets using one of those sticky Command Strips. You don't want to have to look for the receiver too, and it's great for me to always know where the finder is.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I lose my remote or keys minimum once a week. I was very impressed with the items and they work great. I was shocked that each piece had a battery in the unit as well as a package of extra batteries for each one! The stickers for remotes could be smaller but if positioned right they’re not to bad.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyB

customer_reviews.title: AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: First of all, 2Go has contacted me to write a review. I've been waiting to write the review to see how these would work in time. After awhile, I forgot about writing the review because the products, F6 Key Finder has been flawless. Unfortunately we've had to use it a "few" times. Like I said, flawless, worked each time. The keys have been "misplaced" in the house so we are talking a 35-40 foot radius. Bought another set from another supplier because of how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: R. Galvani

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars if there was a way to label the buttons on the locator. Also, the receivers are thick and are hard to attach to things like remotes. If you place a receiver too deep within a purse, it can be hard to hear the beeps. All that being stated, this finder has already saved me heaps of frustration in locating keys, canes, umbrellas, wallets and eyeglass cases. I have given a Click n Dig as a gift to a relative who likes it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Navigator

customer_reviews.title: New version may have better battery contacts. Who knows?
customer_reviews.text: My set lasted for about one year. When the wafer batteries failed, replacing them with new ones did not restore good function to most of these units. The wafer batteries are difficult to remove without distorting the spring that holds them in tight electrical connection with the units. One of the six ceased to work reliably because of an intermittent contact. While they were all working at useful distances from the hand-held unit, this product was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived fully loaded with batteries, plus additional batteries. I was a bit nervous that the beep would scare my dog, however he did not react to it at all. It is necessary to place the remote in a stationery location; I'm saying this because my neighbor kept misplacing her wireless remote. My neighbor found this most useful for misplaced car keys; I have used this for the TV remote which is a constant. I really only have positive things to say about this item -- would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT!! This has been a great time saver. Not just for lost keys but for lost remotes and my glasses. The set came with batteries in each devise and extra batteries for everything!! While the instructions say the batteries only last six months you won't have to buy any batteries for a year because of the extra batteries that are supplied with the set. The beep is loud enough to hear but not that annoying smoke detector beep that drives my dogs crazy. I suggest this product to anyone who misplaces items on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: legaliane

customer_reviews.title: This product is helpful for finding lost keys, dog ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is helpful for finding lost keys, dog leash, and other items that have a key ring type attachment. My wife put it in her purse and she can locate it within about 25 feet or so from the remote when button is depressed. It is extremely simple to use! Battery life must be taken into consideration so if you use the item frequently, you will need to replace the batteries more often. I noticed difficulty having less of a range the more I used the device. When I replaced the battery in the colored tag and the remote, everything corrected.
customer_reviews.author: dancingtoledo

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a life saver!! !
customer_reviews.text: Omgggg my favorite thing ever. This is the second time purchasing this set and it really is a life saver!!! Wish I could give a 10 stars!!! Amazing price and works perfectly. Battery life is long too which is so great!
customer_reviews.author: C gheblikian

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Makes life so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Click n Dig. I have owned it since January and could not be happier. The little beeping devices could stick to more things if they were smaller but we've gotten creative to make it work . Being able to find remotes and keys has made our lives so much easier and less stressful. The beep is loud enough to hear from upstairs in our open concept 1500sq ft house. We have a list on the fridge of what color beeper goes to what item. A place to write this on the back of the remote would be really helpful! I recommend this to anyone who hates wasting time looking for anything at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews but had to write this one as these things have been one of the biggest savers of time. My mother is at the stage of forgetting where she leaves things and we would spend hours looking for keys, checkbook and purse etc. that she would "hide" to keep people from stealing. Now we can just use the clicker and find these items in a short period of time. Wish there were more than 3 of each type as we could use them on quite a few things but at least the most important items are covered. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as flexible as needed
customer_reviews.text: Performance is as advertised the only issue I have is the receivers are bulkier than I like. Attaching to a TV remote is almost impossible because my Dish remotes have no flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Pat J

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product that has SAVED me.  Practically a necessity.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have car keys, and iPhone, a bunch of tiny remote controls for various objects...it goes on. Before purchasing this product, I spent SO much time searching for remote controls, my phone, my keys. I was late in the morning because I couldn't find my keys or phone. One time, my toddler put my keys in the garbage can. I found them because of this product - avoided what would have been a complete disaster. For anyone who has a busy, crazy life that involves numerous small objects, I would say that this product is a near necessity. It works perfectly, and is exactly as described. Arrived on time. Worth every penny. Needless to say, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tedrow

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works well for keys and larger items.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a low price point. The sound it make is high pitched enough for me to hear from two rooms away (around 2 feet and two walls). I like that I can locate several items with the one controller. I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 just because the locators (the items you attach to your keys or wallet, etc) are relatively thick. This works well for a keychain or a remote control (I use it for both), but is not as good for a cell phone or wallet. Still, given the affordable price, it's a great choice. You'd have to pay significantly more for one with a much slimmer design.
customer_reviews.author: Rm-SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Product works but, DO NOT ALLOW YOUR CHILDREN TO PLAY WITH YOUR KEYS IF YOU HAVE THIS RECEIVER ATTACHED TO THEM
customer_reviews.text: I used it the first week I bought it. It works just as advertised! In regards to the set, I wish the three loose receiver were key receivers instead. One problem I had was that the battery lid came loose exposing the battery when I pulled the keys out of my pocket. I had to secure it with a piece of tape. This is a big issue if you have children. These batteries can be very, very dangerous - even deadly - for children if swallowed. DO NOT ALLOW YOUR CHILDREN TO PLAY WITH YOUR KEYS IF YOU HAVE THIS RECEIVER ATTACHED TO IT!
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Easter egg hunts in the dark no more!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a god send. Our mother loses things constantly. This has helped us find her purse when she puts in her hamper, remote control when she puts it her suitcase. (What was frustrating with her dementia, is now fun. Press a button and find the lost things.) Only two complaints.... It's not small enough to fit on her glasses. And when the batteries are dying, it sounds like a ticking time bomb. Does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Forgetful husband
customer_reviews.text: These work so well for my husband who is always losing his keys. I bought them for him for Christmas and he has enjoyed them. They are easy to put on the keychains and easy to use. The only thing that could be improved on is the size of the tags that go in your wallet. They are a little bit thick to put in your wallet, but they do work wonderfully even inside the wallet. My husband has enjoyed finding his keys easily and I have enjoyed not having to help him find them. I would definitely recommend these key finders!
customer_reviews.author: happy wife

customer_reviews.title: Roughly works 15% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: I received the newer version of this item to review. I performed multiple tests over the course of a couple days at varied distances. My tests concluded that this roughly works 1 in 6 times. You could put all 6 finders at the same distance (say 2 feet away all in a circle around the remote). Then click on the buttons 1 at a time. A random finder will work on each test, but just 1 (sometimes I was lucky and would get 2 to work on the test). It still needs work but is a well put together product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Roth

customer_reviews.title: Fine, fine item!
customer_reviews.text: These come in quite handy as I often misplace, or just find new places to store them, my keys, wallet, and various other things. I would like to suggest expanding these finders so they could fit inside my wallet better. They don't work very well after you wash & dry them in my washer & dryer. I guess they really aren't water proof. They can withstand a lot more weight than I thought. I had been keeping one with my wallet and forgot to take it out before sitting down on it. I am about 250lbs and all that happened was a bruise on my butt cheek! Excellent item!
customer_reviews.author: WhiteHouseSouthwest

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I bogged ide would be and or works perfectly. I can't tell about battery life because I had sent had or long enough. Bit otherwise it is great and I feel piwerful.knowing I can always easily find my keys, phone, etc. Tge fact that it includes 3 key fobs that attach with rings and 3 stick on finders is even better!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: I have had the FINDONEFINDALL.... and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the FINDONEFINDALL....and dreamed somehow of improving upon it. WRONG. This unit is LESS powerful in it's reach, and less loud when playing. Moreover, I had one unit on my cell phone, and it continually fell off. Cheap, not worth the while, buy the real thing, there is too much at stake, with time pressing you to find your keys, phone and so on... get the real thing. I have mine and if you pay the postage, you can have the enitre unit. no lie. PS: how about allowing a 0 star? Sacredwriter
customer_reviews.author: sacredwriter

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this product. It has saved me so many headaches and time from looking for my wallet,cell phone and keys What is really nice is that it used batteries. Other key finders do not and once they stop working you have to buy the whole product again!! Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: laney

customer_reviews.title: they are loud and work at a good distance. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: One moment my toddler was standing beside me in the store, the next moment he ran around the corner behind a display. I chased him around the corner and he was gone! Very scary moment. Clip one of the receivers on your toddlers belt loop when going in public for that peace of mind. These work very well, they are loud and work at a good distance. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Found them!!
customer_reviews.text: I attached the Click n Dig receivers to my husband's and my key chains. My husband din't like them attached to his keys at first; but recently he lost his business keys. After looking for two days, he remembered he had the receiver attached. Within 5 minutes he had the finder in hand and had located his keys stuck between his vehicle seat and the console. He said he never would have found them had it not been for the (Click n Dig Model F6) key finder. YAY! We both love these!
customer_reviews.author: Grams

customer_reviews.title: Great Device for Finding Keys and Pocketbooks
customer_reviews.text: This my second of these. My mom hid her pocketbook in her assisted living apartment and forgot where it was hidden. We often had to search for it along with her keys and check book. This solved our problem. A transmitter in her purse, one stuck to her checkbook and another fastened to her keys solved our problems. We can always find them. I highly recommend these. Bought another for my wife who constantly loses her keys and cell phone. It also locates her pocket book.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works for a second then nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Not all the contacs worked. 2 didn't. Of the 4 that did, 1 stopped working immediately after install. Seriously, it worked and then it didn't! Great concept but inconsistent effect. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn Mollica

customer_reviews.title: This can save the day!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my college aged son who loses his keys and wallet every day. He loves this and worked well in his dorm room. He says it saved him lots of time looking for keys. If you lose keys often this can save a lot of time and aggravation. Since there was extra his roommate also used a fob for his keys. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: peterfamily

customer_reviews.title: Too Quiet & didn't Work Well
customer_reviews.text: This finder over all did a very poor job but the colors were nice. Most importantly you had to be so close to find your missing object because the sound/beeps were to LOW plus the battery life was short.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying  Stephem.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause I lose my keys/ iPad and wallet on occasion. Sometimes it is covered up,by paper on a desk or whatever. It works like a champ. I wrote down which color goes to which Beeper and when I get confused and can't find something I go to my little cheat sheet press the button and there you go- found it! . For the young and for the old if you misplace things on occasion this thing works great. Range varies but 30-40" is about right. Goes thru walls to detects the signal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S

customer_reviews.title: clever, low-tech little system for forgetful folks
customer_reviews.text: A clever little system for forgetful folks (like... everyone, although in this case, my parents). Fantastic customer service, and a great low-tech (not SmartPhone-based) way of finding your lost items. The beepers are not super loud, but they are loud enough. Best not to put the receivers in purses, etc. They are easy to attach to things (though slightly gaudy).
customer_reviews.author: MHurwit

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great value
customer_reviews.text: A lot of times it takes a couple clicks on the key finder before the receiver beeps which is a little annoying. The beeps could also stand to be a little louder. It still gets 4 out of 5 stars, however, because it's really quite cheap. I'd say they pay for themselves after only a few uses. There are three people in my house, so we each have a unit on our keys; we have all used it a number of times. The sticky pads are: 1 unused, 1 on a wallet, and 1 on the TV remote. Seriously, the couch just gobbles that remote up, all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great for the absent minded
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. I have a daughter that loses everything so attached one of theses to her keys, phone (via the adhesive one) and her purse has one in it. I leave the control fob by the door so she knows where it is and it doesn't move. I watched her run to the fob over and over to find her stuff. What a life saver for her! It beeps till you can locate it and I have yet to require a battery replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for Click 'n Dig!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I ever lived without these nifty little items. They are indispensable. No more lost keys, missing remote control, hidden wallet, disappearing cell phone...I totally love these little jewels. I can spend less time searching, and more time enjoying. The only complaint that I have is that the stickies don't really do the job...I needed to use a bit of super glue on my tv remote. I don't know who invented this little miracle, but I hope his wife is beautiful, and all his kids are rich...
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after my little ones decided to hide my work keys....for over a week! Just last week we busted it out for our first search. Worked like a charm. Aside from being slightly over-sized we are pleased that they do their job. The original set comes with extra batteries; the battery life is about 1 year and some of my receivers stopped responding despite replacing the batteries. My husband didn't like the feel of the flat ones attached to the remote and said little one has since removed them but we use all 3 key chain receivers. Perfect for those who misplace their keys or have littles that do.
customer_reviews.author: LngHrnSara

customer_reviews.title: Quiet as a mouse and 7' range max.
customer_reviews.text: This thing only works for less than 7 feet away. And the place better be silent for you to hear it. 30 decibel max if your lucky. You better be real close to it to hear it and things have to be silent. Would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bilotta

customer_reviews.title: Huge help if the transmitter can be attached easily.
customer_reviews.text: Click n' Dig is a HUGE help in keeping track of keys, purse, sun glasses. I keep the transmitter on the kitchen table, and the receivers can be heard almost everywhere in the house. Even from the car close to the house. But, the receiver does not easily attach to things which do not have a relatively large flat surface. My remote is rounded. The receiver did not do well glued to the back of my cell phone; too thick and bulky, and came off quickly. If you can use the hanging receiver it's definitely a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Martha in Philly

customer_reviews.title: A useful gadget!
customer_reviews.text: A useful gadget for people who lose their keys! The fobs that can be attached to your keys, device, item, etc. with the jump ring are pretty good (BUT they are a little big). The sticky tape to hold the other receivers to objects that can't be attached with a 'ring' don't hold very well and are pretty bulky. I have already had one come loose and need to be replaced. If they were half the size and thinner, it would be an even better product! Just don't misplace the transmitter or everything is lost once again! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I really like this alot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this alot, and wanted to give it 5 stars. I have used it to find my keys many times. I also have a stick on receiver on my TV remote. (love this for when someone loses the remote in the couch cushions) I have 2 complaints. - the size of the stick on receiver. Its a bit big. It would be great if it was smaller. - the adhesive is for the stick on receiver. It does not last. AS far as the key ring receivers they are perfect and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: jjmmdd

customer_reviews.title: but we've tested them and they seem fine. I'm not sure how long the batteries last ...
customer_reviews.text: We got these because the kids kept losing the tv remote controls. We haven't lost one to see if they work, but we've tested them and they seem fine. I'm not sure how long the batteries last but it did come with extra. Don't order two sets for yourself because the colors are synced so if you push the yellow button, both items will ring. The plastic tabs to pull out initially are very hard to get out. We accidentally broke one pulling on it. Overall, this is worth the money and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Wardlow

customer_reviews.title: Fustration Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. Whether you are experiencing memory problems or not, it is guaranteed to save you the time and fustration of hunting for missing keys, remote controls, our dog's leash, etc. If you have a husband like mine, who doesn't set his keys down in a designated spot, Click 'n Dig will get him out the door without any "did anyone see my keys?" We have even bought Click 'n Digs for our parents who thoroughly love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharoni

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that I purchased this little lifesaver! I have a very forgetful son who spends so much of his time looking for his important items like his wallet, his keys, his cell phone, etc. This has saved our family time and stress by pushing the button and hearing where he has left his possessions. Last week, he himself found his own car keys with the Click remote in the freezer! No lie! He actually left his keys in the freezer! So now you can hopefully understand how much we love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sportymama

customer_reviews.title: Bummer.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be THE thing to help me find remotes around the house. Alas, the adhesive doesn't work well, they are an odd shape and size which makes storing the remotes a hassle. And since the adhesive came off randomly on all of my remotes, I still can't always find them OR the receivers. Don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Practical in NYC!

customer_reviews.title: I like them BUT it would also be a wonderful feature ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them BUT it would also be a wonderful feature to add a "clap" or "whistle"... or better yet! A way to log into a phone or computer to set off the signal to find them when you are OUTSIDE the home... I keep my finder remote on top of my desk so I know where it always is and it has helped me MANY times I just worry about losing them away from home meanwhile my finder button is at home... but I can't get to it because.. I've misplaced my keys lol
customer_reviews.author: luvnmybabies

customer_reviews.title: Lost AND Found!
customer_reviews.text: For those of us (or a family member) who often misplaces their house/car keys - or other items such as your tv remote, stereo remote, etc... - the Click 'n Dig is an invaluable item. Just I magine, your keys fell out of your pocket somewhere in the house/yard or your remote is not where you always set it or your indoor cat got outside (luckily she had a Click 'n Dig attached to her collar) - all you have to do is press the button on your transmitter and you can find your lost/ misplaced item!
customer_reviews.author: Northeaster

customer_reviews.title: good tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought for my aging parents so they can find their remote control and purse/keys etc. Does need sticky velcro to attach to some items
customer_reviews.author: B. Michael

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after we lost a set of keys to one of our vehicles. They are simple in concept - you push the corresponding color on the locator to the key you wish to find and the receiver beeps. It's effective and saves me time! I do wish that they had a set you could buy that were all "key ring" style instead of half "stick on." I do not use it for remotes in the house or anything else. The stick on ones do not have a hole to insert a key ring even if you wanted to, that would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Strategic Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Saved me hours! Hunting time reduced!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me hours of time ! so many times the Remote has lost by one of the kids and we've actually been able to find it quickly . the minus one star is only because if it is stuck under the couch it can be extremely hard to hear and sometimes can't hear it at all unless you lift up the cushion or area where it is. So I wish it was a little bit louder but otherwise it is great and the best money I've spent in a while.
customer_reviews.author: AS Fremont

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly when you attach them keys and other items ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly when you attach them keys and other items. I wish they made a model that was suitable for rugged outdoor use. Maybe in the future?
customer_reviews.author: Feuilles Mortes

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love We are the most key losingist family. Our phones each got a finder, and so did our keys. Saved us from hours long searches when your phone goes dead, and you can't find it. Con's - you have to have the master remote near you to find it. So we leave the master remote hanging near the door and when someone can't find their stuff we press our assigned colors
customer_reviews.author: Karenia

customer_reviews.title: They work, not too expesive, and might make you feel better
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I received this kit, I've ironically been acutely aware of where everything is. I suppose that's part of the appeal of this - it makes you more aware. There is nothing here that will fit in a man's wallet, it adds noticeable heft to my key ring, and if you have kids they'll probably peel the ones made for remotes or phones right off while they're fidgeting with them. This said, I think the price is a great value and at least I've done something rather than just complain about misplacing things as I get older.
customer_reviews.author: MikeInWeston

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Best buy of my life. Bought this for my boyfriend because he is always losing his keys/wallet/phone/etc. Has a very loud ring that you can hear from outside the house and sticks onto the surface really well. He uses it on a daily basis. I tied the home remote to our doorknob so he won't lose that too :P Loved it a lot better than the TrackR system. The thin devices are pretty slick and aren't too bulky, really good for the back of a phone. Great for someone who loses their phone and also sucks at charging it! I don't think he could live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: the product is OK for what it costs. Mine started having problems (random beeping in 2 units without them being activated) after only 2 or 3 months of use. Turned out bad receivers battery connection, fixed that myself with a pair of pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Gadget

customer_reviews.title: WORKS ON YOUR PETS AS WELL ...
customer_reviews.text: If you got a Jack Russell or a bunch like we do , or any dog you're going to love this. The dog gets a little scared of the sound and run home, great training tool for those puppies to bring them home when trailing they learn quick. To bad keys don't com out running to you.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: I big puffy heart this product.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a game changer. I lose my keys all the time. Sometimes it’s my fault, sometimes my kids play with them and lovingly tuck them into toyboxes/toy purses/doll houses you name it. The blissful adrenaline rush of finding the keys stuffed in the “freezer” of the kids’ toy kitchen, and knowing that I just averted a week of using my emergency spare keys, and searching for the darn master set, validates the entire purchase price right then and there. Shocking how much stress it has reduced.
customer_reviews.author: gryffindormommy

customer_reviews.title: A truly great find!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My wife has a tendancy to ... let's say ... misplace items. Since using the Click n' Dig, we were able to locate a lost, I mean misplaced, cell phone, two sets of keys and her entire purse! It has paid for itself over and over again and given me piece of mind as well. It does what it says it does and is very reasonably priced to boot! True story: I gave it to her as a gift and she almost immediately misplaced the box! Luckily we found it, and my days of searching by sight alone are over.
customer_reviews.author: Steve U

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting something like this for years. I've had them a couple of months and am really happy. I'm always leaving my keys somewhere odd in my house. And now, I can find them. My only problem is putting the remote in a place where I can find it! It should have a strong magnet on it so that I can put it on my refrigerator. The double sided tape should be stronger or there should be more of it, because it doesn't stick to my TV remote very long. Still, a very helpful product that I think some of my relatives will be getting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

product_meta.title: Click 'n Dig Model F6 Key Finder. 6 Receivers. Wireless RF Remote Item, Wallet Locator.
product_meta.description: Size:1-packModel F6 from Click N Dig is a newer model with 6 total brightly colored receivers. This Key, Wallet, Remote Finder is a convenient and high quality gadget that works! It beeps the right device every time. Simply press and hold down the color coded button on the radio transmitter until the corresponding colored receiver beeps to find the item up to 60 feet away and hidden under the pillows or across the walls. Radio frequency penetrates walls, cushions, leather etc. So the receivers beep from the other side of the walls, or when hidden deep in the couch or sofa pillows. Now never lose your keys, wallet, remote control, cell phone etc. Other technical details: Frequency: 433 MHz Sound Volume: 90-105 dB, Remote distance range: 60-80 feet. Shop with confidence! All orders are shipped within 24 hours.
feature_bullets: Total 6 stylish, brightly colored receivers. 3 Key Ring Shaped and 3 Flat Receivers.
New and Improved Model with Brighter Colors, Smaller Size and Sturdier Built
1 RF transmitter with 6 brightly colored buttons. Extra Batteries and Thin Double Sided Adhesive Tape Included.
Full 12 Month Warranty on the product, including the batteries.
All Receivers have flashing LED light as well. Click N Dig Products are FCC certified.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,396 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
